comments:
One of the debug views seems to be trying to recursively create itself. It seems
to be trying to use WorkbenchPage.findView(WorkbenchPage.java:1455) to look up
its own ID while its controls are still being created. The view won't be able to
find itself in the workbench page until it is fully initialized, so it almost
certainly isn't getting back the result it expects.

(The workbench wasn't checking for this condition until recently).

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-03-11 19:55:24.449
!MESSAGE Warning: Detected attempt by view org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugView to
create itself recursively (this is probably, but not necessarily, a bug)
